metadata.name: Pilgrim #1. Kira Kotova.
metadata.description:
Archived records of Incident 546SD.
Free trade station ferry type 8 ID: "Pilgrim".

id: ffdca0789fcda
prof: Senior engineer
name: Kira Kotova

Place of birth station Karat system New Europe.
Higher engineering education Hermes University.
Participated in the incident of 546. According to the investigation of the incident, the first came into contact with the Xarr type. Actively participated in the main events of the incident.

This is the first part of the interactive series Pilgrim. Prelude representing the main characters. Next, we will dive into an interesting story where each NFT holder of this series will be able to influence it. (After the prelude, a Discord channel will be created and all NFT owners will be invited)
I started to invent this story at the university under the impression of a series of novels Hyperion Cantos by Dan Simmons.
I hope you enjoy it.
Let's create it together!

(Proceeds from the sale of the first will be used to speed up production of the series.)
